paper.title: On Horn Envelopes and Hypergraph Transversals

author.org: University of california at San Diego
Athens University of Economics and Business.

paper.venue: International Symposium on Algorithms and Computation
paper.abstract: We study the problem of bounding from above and below a given set of bit vectors by the set of satisfying truth assignments of a Horn formula. We point out a rather unexpected connection between the upper bounding problem and the problem of generating all transversals of a hypergraph, and settle several related complexity questions.
